content:
Is there a place where we collect what seems like spurious test failures that are not (obviously) network-related?
I encountered two of these today:

  • https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/80624#issuecomment-753651535
  • https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/80591#issuecomment-753535696

you can probably file an issue for each, and tag T-infra A-spurious. We unfortunately don't really have bandwidth to be too proactive about squashing them, so if it picks up less than 1 failure/day on average it's unlikely we'll touch it (and that might be even a bit low)
